DOC.brief_summary: Intense , eccentric resistance exercise cause muscle damage , soreness , inflammation , loss muscle function . Protein-amino acid supplementation , , follow damage resistance exercise may reduce muscle damage accelerate recovery . This study determine supplementation Herbalife 24 Rebuild Strength ( compare placebo ) , , 90-minute bout eccentric exercise attenuate exercise-induced muscle damage , inflammation , delay onset muscle soreness ( DOMS ) , speeds recovery muscle function , maintain immune function NASCAR pit crew athlete ( Hendrick Motor Sports ) .
DOC.brief_title: Protein Recovery From Exercise-induced Muscle Damage
DOC.detailed_description: Intense , eccentric resistance exercise produce high mechanical force lead muscle damage , soreness , inflammation , loss muscle function ( J Sci Med Sport 2010 ; 13:178-181 ) . Limited evidence suggest protein-amino acid supplementation , , follow damage resistance exercise reduces muscle damage accelerate recovery resistance train subject ( J Int Soc Sports Nutr 2012 ; 9:20 ; Int J Sport Nutr Exerc Metab 2010 ; 20:236-44 ; Appl Physiol Nutr Metab 2008 ; 33:483-8 ) . Herbalife 24 Rebuild Strength protein-amino acid supplement recommend use resistance exercise help rebuild muscle , speed recovery , support immune function , promote muscle repair . ( http : //performancenutrition.herbalife.com/en/products/ rebuild-strength ) . A serve Rebuild Strength ( 50.5 gram ) contain 190 kilocalorie , 24 gram protein , 18 gram carbohydrate , 1 gram fat , vitamin mineral ( C , E , B1 , B6 , B12 , pantothenic acid , calcium , iron , magnesium , chromium , sodium , potassium , 10 % 150 % Daily Value level ) . The 24 gram protein per serve include whey casein protein , L-glutamine ( 3,000 mg ) , branched-chain amino acid ( BCAA ) ( 4,000 mg ) . ( See nutrition label website ) . Purpose : To determine supplementation Herbalife 24 Rebuild Strength ( compare placebo ) , , 90-minute bout eccentric exercise attenuate exercise-induced muscle damage , inflammation , delay onset muscle soreness ( DOMS ) , speed recovery muscle function , maintain innate immune function NASCAR pit crew athlete ( Hendrick Motor Sports ) . Research design : Subjects randomize Rebuild Strength placebo supplement ( double blind administration color bottle , code hold Herbalife study complete ) . Testing Sequence : 1 . Subjects come HMS training facility overnight fast state ( food beverage water previous 8 hour ) provide DOMS rating blood sample . Height , weight , percent body fat ( skinfolds ) also obtain . 2 . Rebuild Strength subject consume 2 scoop ( 50.5 gram product 24 gram protein ) water 15-20 min prior 90-min eccentric exercise bout . Subjects placebo group consume 2 scoop supplement without protein amino acid ( carbohydrate add keep energy intake group ) . Supplements prepared Herbalife cod `` A '' `` B '' , double blind code maintain study complete . 3 . Muscle function test follow supplementation : vertical jump , kneel medicine ball toss , 30-second Wingate test ( see description ) . 4 . Subjects engage 90-min eccentric exercise ( see description ) , 1 scoop Rebuild Strength ( 12 gram protein ) placebo ingest 45 min exercise . 5 . Immediately follow exercise , subject ingest 2 scoop Rebuild Strength ( 24 gram protein ) placebo , provide DOMS rating blood sample , take three muscle function test . Total protein intake , , immediately 90-min eccentric exercise bout 60 gram . All subject refrain food beverage intake ( except water ) one hour take final supplement dose . 6 . Subjects return 7 overnight fast state three day row eccentric exercise bout , provide DOMS rating blood sample follow ingestion 2 scoop Rebuild Strength placebo , three muscle function test . Subjects engage normal train 3-day recovery period . The blood sample analyze marker muscle damage , inflammation , immune function . Eccentric Exercise Bout : HMS pit crew member engage eccentric exercise bout regular basis , familiar exercise utilized study induce muscle damage soreness . The 90-minute eccentric exercise bout consist 17 different exercise : 1 . Hammer incline press eccentric focus ( 3 set , 5 rep ) . 2 . Bench press resistance band ( 3 set , 20 second fatigue ) . 3 . Supine medicine ball ( 9.1 kg ) explosive catch throw ( 20 second , 3 set ) . 4 . Bent ( 90â—‹ ) arm hang fatigue ( 3 set ) . 5 . Eccentric lat pull ( 8 rep , 3 set ) . 6 . Partner row eccentric pull ( 8 rep per arm , 3 set ) . 7 . Eccentric triceps extension ( 8 rep per arm , 3 set ) . 8 . Eccentric bicep curl ( 8 rep , 3 set ) . 9 . Explosive tuck jump ( 20 second , 3 set ) . 10 . Eccentric back extension ( 8 rep , 3 set ) . 11 . Eccentric hamstring curl ( 8 rep , 3 set ) . 12 . 20 second sprint inclined treadmill electrical power ( 3 set ) . 13 . Split squat ( 15 rep leg , 2 set ) . 14 . Walk 0.40 km dumbbell , shoulder shrug every three step . 15 . Isometric abdominal curl medicine ball ( 9.1 kg ) twist side side 20 second ( 3 set ) . 16 . Abdominal crunch 20 second ( 3 set ) . 17 . Plank position ( elbow toe ) 45 second ( 2 set ) .
DOC.criteria: NASCAR pit crew members/recruits Hendrick Motorsports Agree avoid use protein supplement 4day study Heart problem tell MD engage vigorous exercise History allergy milk soy product
